choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Subject: Notification of My Departure from the Company

Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you that I have made the difficult decision to leave my position at our company. After much thought and consideration, I have decided to pursue new opportunities outside of our organization.

My time here has been rewarding and I want to thank you for the opportunity to be a part of this team. I have learned so much from my colleagues and the experience I have gained will stay with me forever.

I am committed to making sure that my departure is smooth and seamless, and I will work closely with my replacement to ensure a smooth transition. I will also make sure all outstanding projects are completed before my last day.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to assist in the transition process or any other matter related to my departure.

Once again, thank you for everything and I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
